#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>

#define int64 long long int

using namespace std;

//int fsum[10000];

inline int nextInt()
{
	char c;
	int64 n = 0;

	while ((c = getchar()) < 48);
	n += (c - '0');

	while ((c = getchar()) >= 48)
	  n = n * 10 + (c - '0');

	return n;
	
}

/* void encode(){
	for(int i = 1; i < 10000; i++)
		fsum[i] = fsum[i-1]+(i/2);
}
 */
int main()
{
//	memset(fsum,0,sizeof(fsum));
//    encode();
	
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    
    int64 T = nextInt();
    
    while(T--)
    {
        
        int64 N = nextInt();
		
        printf("%ld\n",((int64)(N%2 == 0 ? pow(double(N/2),2): ((pow(double(N/2),2)+(N/2))))));

	}
    
    return 0;
    
}
